channel.title: Wolf Rune or Fox Rune for Kaiju Drop?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wolf Rune or Fox Rune for Kaiju Drop?" - Trade possible?

item.title: Wolf Rune or Fox Rune for Kaiju Drop?
item.content:encoded:
I just obtained a Wolf Rune and I also have a Fox Rune. Since i already have all of the Runic Items, i was wondering if anyone would be willing to trade for a Kaiju Drop (not Red Water or Magical Wand). Let me know by sending me a PM (Vern05) in the game.

Uhâ€¦I just realized this was in the wrong place. Can a mod delete it please?
